帓字的基本解释

帓
mò
头巾：“皇后御绛帓。”
带子：“箱箧馈巾帓。”

帓
wà
古同“袜”，袜子。

帓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mò］
［《廣韻》莫鎋切，入鎋，明。］
巾。用以包扎的织物。参见“帓首”。
[②]［wà］
［《集韻》勿發切，入月，微。］
同“襪1”。

帓字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　帓； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页329第40
【五音集韻】莫撥切，音末。【玉篇】巾也。【正字通】幧頭也。亦作鞨。【列子·湯問篇】北國之人，鞨巾而裘。　又【廣韻】帶也。　又【類篇】足衣也。　又【廣韻】莫鎋切【韻會】【正韻】莫轄切，?蠻入聲。義同。

帓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
帓字的起名意思

暂无。

帓
Basic explanation of words
帓
mò
Headscarf: "The Queen's Royal Silk."
Strap: "Box 箧 is for the towel."
帓
wà
Gu Tong "socks", socks.
帓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mò］
["Guangyun" Do not cut, enter, Ming. ]
towel. The fabric used for wrapping. See "Bei Shou".
[②]［wà］
["Ji Yun" do not cut, enter the month, micro. ]
Same as "sock 1".
帓
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Scarf Character Department] 　帓; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 329 40
【Pentagram Rhyme】Don't dial and cut, the end of the sound. [Jade articles] Towels too. 【Zhengzitong】Saitou also. Also known as the fate. 【Liezi·Tangwen Article】The people of the North are adorned with scarves.　 [Guang Yun] again.　[Classes] Footwear also.　[Guangyun] Do not cut [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] Do not cut,? Very entertaining. The same meaning.
帓

сущ.
